item.title: Polyglot monorepo build and maintenance automation
item.author: contact@fnjoin.com (Salman Malik, Archie Cowan)
item.description: CDK is to AWS services (ec2, lambda, s3, sagemaker, etc) As Projen is to software project infrastructure (npm, maven, pip, poetry, eslint, prettier, tsconfig, nx, git, etc) You’re a user of CDK and Typescript. You build applications with Typescript, Javascript, Python, or Java. Want to increase the leverage of your code for reuse in your source repositories? In this article, we’ll empower you with tools for automation to improve the way you manage source code.
